description:
A disposable cooler, reimagined. The Recool is one of the first fully biodegradable coolers, made from recycled paper material. Great for those who need a cooler for a weekend getaway or beach trip. Simply throw it in the compost when you're done and let it return to the earth.

  • Recycled paper and alkyl ketene dimer material is completely compostable
  • Two side handles for easy carrying
  • 4 cup holders on lid
  • Holds ice for up to 12 hours. Holds water for up to 5 days
name: Igloo Recool 16QT Biodegradable Cooler
